quotes.quote: I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me.
I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
Being loved is the only thing that is admirable by any stretch of the imagination.
To have the chance of being loved we have to take a chance on being destroyed inside.
The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves say rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
Because feeling love does make you feel superior. Until you find out you aren't loved back.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
There is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow creatures, and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort.
To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved any how this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.
When I saw you I fell in love. And you smiled because you knew.
There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.

We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness and call it love true love.

I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me. I love you for the part of me that you bring out.
Once you feel loved by the universe, you're already accepted, and you're not really concerned about offending people.
I used to think being loved was the greatest thing to think about, but now I know love is never satisfied just thinking about it.

I think that one of the things that you do learn is that falling in love and being in love with someone is a rarity. That you don't fall in love as many times as you think you're going to. And then when you do, it's really special; it's really important.
No matter what has happened. No matter what you've done. No matter what you will do. I will always love you. I swear it.
The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
People fall in love without reason, without even wanting to. You can't predict it. That's love.
Behind every angry soul is a wounded child that just wanted you to love them for who they are.
Feeling loved by God means feeling glad not only that he crushed his son so that I can be forgiven, but that he's crushing everything that takes away from my praising of the glory of his grace.

To be loved but not known is comforting but superficial. To be known and not loved is our greatest fear. But to be fully known and truly loved is, well, a lot like being loved by God. It is what we need more than anything. It liberates us from pretense, humbles us out of our self-righteousness, and fortifies us for any difficulty life can throw at us.
The love we give away is the only love we keep.
It is impossible to live without love. You must have the feeling of being loved.
Being in love is the best feeling on the planet. I really believe that love makes the world go round.
Being in love, I find myself smiling for no reason at all.
With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt because love is an amazing feeling.
If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
I loved the feeling of finally falling in love to someone who would love me back.

A loving relationship is one in which the loved one is free to be himself to laugh with me, but never at me; to cry with me, but never because of me; to love life, to love himself, to love being loved. Such a relationship is based upon freedom and can never grow in a jealous heart.
Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.

But the experience that I had, which was basically just feeling loved and taken care of in a room full of thousands of people I didn't know, seemed to be a pretty strong sign that what I was doing was a good thing.
Love is the wisdom of the fool, and the folly of the wise.
The cure love is marriage, and the cure for marriage is love again.
As soon as you cannot keep anything from a woman, you love her.
It's the nature of women not to love when we love them, and to love them not.
Love brings light to darkness darkness; it reaches through, sees through and follows through.
Love is patient however; it does not sit on the fence.
Love is never fragmented; it's an inseparable whole which does not delight in bits and pieces.
To love and be loved demands your best.
If love isn't flowing it's dying, and like the stream without it's source, one cannot give something which he does not first possess.
Being surrounded by love at home should be the base for your life.
Remember that the best relationships that in which mutual love is bigger that mutual necessity.
Love and cook with passion.
To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
Tell me whom you love, and I will tell you who you are.
Love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
Love is a superstition that doth fear. The idol which it itself has made.
Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'I' of loving.
I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
If you wan't to be loved. Be lovable.
We loved with a love that was more than love.
All mankind love a lover.
Love is a game that two can play and both win.
Everything is clearer when you're in love.
Where there is love there is life.
Love consists in this, that two solitude protect and touch and greet each other.
Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
Love that is not madness is not love.
Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; it's eyes are for the stars.
Love is but the discovery of ourselves in other, and the delight in the recognition.
Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
